supports

public boolean supports(java.lang.Class<? extends Device> deviceClass)
Indicates whether the current adapter supports the given device class.

Parameters:
deviceClass - class to check
Returns:
true if device class is supported

createOverviewView

public View createOverviewView(LayoutInflater layoutInflater,
                               Device rawDevice)
Creates an overview view for the given device. The device has to match the adapter device type, otherwise a cast exception occurs.

Parameters:
layoutInflater - layoutInflater to create the view
rawDevice - device used for filling the view
Returns:
overview view
